name: Crazy Rocket (jabuchae)
description:
Crazy Rocket is a short (5 minutes) skill game that lets you fly a rocket, avoiding moving obstacles. It was developed as an assignment for a Unity course by Ben Tristem, Rick Davidson, and the GameDev.tv Team. Visual assets and some initial code were taken from the course materials.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the spacebar to thrust and the left/right arrows to rotate.

Source code available here: https://github.com/jabuchae/unitycourselvl1/tree/master/Crazy%20Rocket
